title: @Riot, If I post my my own concept of a new champion..
body:
What are the chances that it will be considered to actually be made?

I have a concept for a new Darkin that accepts and is one with the Darkin weapon, and works with it symbioticly. It's super cool, and want to make a post about it.

I'm just curious, if it's liked, will it possibly be made as an actual champion?
